summary.para: Checks whether a resource, or subresource, is in a specified state, or not.

param.name: Subresource
param.para: The index of the subresource to check. This can be set to an index, or D3D12_RESOURCE_BARRIER_ALL_SUBRESOURCES.

param.name: State
param.para: Specifies the state to check for. This can be one or more D3D12_RESOURCE_STATES flags Or'ed together.

returns.para: This method returns true if the resource or subresource is in the specified state, false otherwise.

summary.para: Returns the debug feature flags that have been set on a command list.

returns.para: A bit mask containing the set debug features.

summary.para: Turns the debug features for a command list on or off.

param.name: Mask
param.para: A combination of feature-mask flags that are combined by using a bitwise OR operation. If a flag is present, that feature will be set to on, otherwise the feature will be set to off.

returns.para: This method returns one of the Direct3D 12 Return Codes.

summary.para: Provides methods to monitor and debug a command list.
